c.id, c.student_id, c.equipment_id, c.first_speed, c.first_hr, c.first_power, c.second_speed, c.second_hr, c.second_power, c.max_power, c.score, c.heart_rate, c.oxygen_uptake, c.int_hr_k, c.int_hr_b, c.create_time, c.upload_time, c.fc,c.suggestion, s.id, s.student_no, s.student_name, s.class_id, s.school_id, s.age, s.sex, s.stature, s.weight
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_cardiopulmonary
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from t_cardiopulmonary
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from t_student s, t_cardiopulmonary c, (SELECT * from t_cardiopulmonary, (SELECT student_id as studentid,MAX(create_time) as maxdate FROM t_cardiopulmonary GROUP BY student_id) x WHERE x.studentid=t_cardiopulmonary.student_id AND x.maxdate =t_cardiopulmonary.create_time) y WHERE y.id=c.id AND c.student_id=s.id

select
from t_cardiopulmonary c,t_student s WHERE c.student_id=#{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and s.id=#{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
